label: 令集解
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: The second of the two commentaries on the Yōrō ritsuryō compiled early in the Heian period.  It was the private work of a single legal schlar, Koremune no Naomoto, who completed it during the Jōgan era (859-77).  (Marian Ury)　[養老律令、惟宗直本、貞観]
